item.description:
Get involved with the community and meet new people

Join the Boston Dyke March Committee!

Help plan one of the country's largest dyke marches and have a great time doing it. Meet cute girls, grrls, and bois, and make new friends while getting your political groove on. Come be a part of the action: plan fun events, network with cool people, socialize all over town, be a part of the Boston queer scene and make the March what you want it to be.

The Boston Dyke March is held on the Friday night before Boston Pride. This year the Dyke March falls on Friday, June 12th.

It takes months to plan this event. Please come check out one of our meetings. All meetings are held at Wainwright Bank Community Room in Davis Square , 250 Elm Street , Somerville . Davis is off the Red line on the T.

Check out or website at www.bostondykemarch .com for all the meeting dates, future events, to make a donation, or see lots of fun pics of previous Boston Dyke Marches .

The Dyke March is for everyone: Dykes, Lesbians, Queers, Bi-Folks, Transwomen, Transmen, Genderqueers, and Allies.
item.how_to_find_us: Just come to the bank and you will see the group.

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March
